string.text: Guys! Whoever can hear me, help! These scumbags are slaughtering us Stalkers!
The pigs got me cornered in the yard. Help me out, brothers!
Marked One. I told Barkeep about you. He should talk to Duty guys to let you through. I suggest you go see him, fast.
Strelok, I have sad news. Fang died. Couldn't meet you. Too bad you went to the center on your own. It was your choice though. I know where to search for you, and whom to ask. Ghost.
